mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts(post_type, user_id, anonymous, title, content) VALUES (#{postType}, #{authorId}, #{anonymous}, #{title}, #{content});
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET anonymous = #{anonymous}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modified_at = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{noticeId};
mapper.select: SELECT p.id id, p.title title, u.id author_id, u.nickname author_nickname, p.anonymous anonymous, p.content content, p.views views, p.likes likes, p.answer_count answer_count, p.created_at created_at, p.modified_at modified_at FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.id = #{noticeId};

SELECT count(p.id) FROM posts p WHERE p.deleted_at IS NULL AND p.post_type = #{postType}
AND p.title LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
